name: Broker Outstanding Detail
query:
WITH installment_data AS (
    SELECT
        c.name,
        c.project as Project,
        c.address as address,
        c.contact_no as contact_no,
        c.customer as customer,
        c.sales_broker,
        c.plot_no,
        d.installment_name as Installment,
        d.date,
        d.remarks,
        d.idx,
        d.amount - IFNULL((
                SELECT SUM(b.paid_amount) AS paid_amount
                FROM `tabCustomer Payment` AS a
                INNER JOIN `tabCustomer Payment Installment` AS b
                ON a.name = b.parent
                WHERE a.docstatus = 1
                AND a.document_number = c.name
                AND b.base_doc_idx = d.idx
                AND a.plot_no = c.plot_no), 0 ) AS receivable_amount
    FROM
        `tabPlot Booking` AS c
    INNER JOIN
        `tabInstallment Payment Plan` AS d
    ON
        c.name = d.parent
    WHERE
        c.docstatus = 1 AND c.status = 'Active' AND c.sales_broker = %(broker)s AND d.date <= %(to_date)s
    Union All
	SELECT
        c.name,
        c.project as Project,
        c.to_address as address,
        c.to_contact_no as contact_no,
        c.to_customer as customer,
        c.sales_broker,
        c.plot_no,
        d.installment_name as Installment,
        d.date,
        d.remarks,
        d.idx,
        d.amount - IFNULL((
                SELECT SUM(b.paid_amount) AS paid_amount
                FROM `tabCustomer Payment` AS a
                INNER JOIN `tabCustomer Payment Installment` AS b
                ON a.name = b.parent
                WHERE a.docstatus = 1
                AND a.document_number = c.name
                AND b.base_doc_idx = d.idx
                AND a.plot_no = c.plot_no), 0 ) AS receivable_amount
    FROM
        `tabProperty Transfer` AS c
    INNER JOIN
        `tabInstallment Payment Plan - Transfer` AS d
    ON
        c.name = d.parent
    WHERE
        c.docstatus = 1 AND c.status = 'Active' AND c.sales_broker = %(broker)s AND d.date <= %(to_date)s
)
    SELECT
    x.Project,
    x.customer, 
    x.plot_no,
    x.name,
    x.address,
    x.contact_no,
    x.Installment,
    x.date,
    x.receivable_amount
    FROM installment_data as x
WHERE 
    receivable_amount <> 0
Order by
   x.project,
   x.name,
   x.idx;
